title: Amazon to buy Bee, a San Francisco-based startup focused on AI wearables
description: Company makes an artificial intelligence-enabled bracelet that can listen in on and transcribe conversations
content:
Amazon.com Inc. AMZN-Q has reached a deal to buy San Francisco-based Bee, a startup making an artificial intelligence-enabled bracelet to listen in on and transcribe conversations.

title: Banks told to make AI work for people, not against them
description: Artificial intelligence should be used to improve the lives of customers instead of just making more money out of them, the corporate regulator tells bankers.
content:
The corporate regulator says his focus is on applying existing laws to the use of AI technology. (Paul Braven/AAP PHOTOS)

title: SoftBank, Stargate eye small data center
description: STARGATE, a multibillion-dollar effort by ChatGPT’s creator OpenAI, SoftBank and Oracle to supercharge US artificial intelligence (AI) ambitions, is now setting the more modest goal of building a small data center by the end of the year, likely in Ohio, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.

title: Humans beat AI gold-level score at top math contest
description: SYDNEY, Australia — Humans beat generative artificial intelligence (AI) models made by Google and OpenAI at a top international mathematics competition, despite the programs reaching gold-level scores for the first time.
content:
